text: Skazhi takzhe (o Mukhammad!) iudeyam, kak nekotoryye pravedniki iz ikh predkov, ne vpavshiye v zabluzhdeniye, kak drugiye, sprosili tekh, kotoryye uveshchevali nechestivtsev: "Pochemu vy uveshchevayete lyudey, kotorykh Allakh pogubit za ikh grekhi i dlya nikh budet zhestokoye nakazaniye v budushchey zhizni?" Oni otvetili: "Dlya opravdaniya pred nashim Gospodom, i, mozhet byt', oni budut bogoboyaznenny
